abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway said Tuesday that Comcast Chief Operating Officer Stephen Burke has been elected as a director, helping broaden a board that consists mainly of long-time insiders.
snippet: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway said Tuesday that Comcast Chief Operating Officer Stephen Burke has been elected as a director, helping broaden a board that consists mainly of long-time insiders.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway  said Tuesday that Comcast its chief operating officer, Stephen Burke, had been elected as a director, helping broaden a board that consists mainly of long-time insiders, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Buffett Broadens Berkshire Board With Burke
